ErrorCodes.db_error: Database error occured. Try again later.
ErrorCodes.unable_to_choose: You can't choose some courses. Review choices to continue.
ErrorCodes.login: Couldn't authenticate with provided email & password.
ErrorCodes.reg_status: Your registration is not approved by teacher/admin yet. If this is wrong contact admin.
ErrorCodes.record_exists: Teacher/student exists with provided email or card number.
ErrorCodes.not_found: Wrong ID provided. Couln't load record(s).
ErrorCodes.no_course_for_spec: No course(s) found for provided speciality.
ErrorCodes.model_state: Invalid data was sended. Try again.
